scripts.build: pnpm run build:root && pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd packages/frontend && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../..
scripts.start:backend: cd packages/backend && pnpm run start && cd ../..
scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:backend & pnpm run dev:frontend
scripts.dev:backend: cd packages/backend && pnpm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.dev:frontend: cd packages/frontend && pnpm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.test:domain: cd packages/domain && pnpm run test && cd ../..
scripts.test:frontend: cd packages/frontend && pnpm run test && cd ../..
scripts.test:backend: cd packages/backend && pnpm run test && cd ../..
scripts.test: pnpm run test:domain && pnpm run test:backend
